name: Handsome Octopus Man
description:
Help Handsome Octopus Man take over the Earth one city at a time by shooting poisonous ink at any humans in your sight. There is a time limit before the spaceship returns so make sure to infect as many humans as you can!

-----------------------------------

Controls

  • Arrow buttons to move
  • Mouse on the game screen to point 
  • Click on the game screen to shoot ink
